author: Devan Cole, CNN
title: NYT: Ex-Navy commander who sounded alarm over outbreak tests positive
description: The Navy captain removed from command of the USS Theodore Roosevelt last week after warning that action was needed to save the lives of his crew from a coronavirus outbreak has tested positive for the virus, according to The New York Times on Sunday.
